page.title: 02Crime and Police
page.content: Because of Portsmouth's size and its position as a port, the city has a high crime rate.To cope with this, the main police station at{Kingston {Crescent}has over 70 police constables and several fast patrol cars.Its mascot is a dummy motorcyclist,'Speedy Gonzales',PC 999.{Kingston Prison}is unique in the country for taking only life sentence prisoners, and has not had an escape for 30 years! Of 9 homicides reported in 1984,only 2 led to convictions, but all burglary (22% of total crime) was claimed to be detected, although less than a third of the stolen property was recovered. Nearly a quarter of crime was motoring offences ; sexual crimes amounted to less than 1%.Of over 29,000 crimes detected,nearly 8,000 were committed by those under the age of 17. -Alexander White,PGS.
